com.epam.training.dao.mysqldao

Class MySQLIssueDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.training.dao.AbstractDAO<Issue>
      • com.epam.training.dao.mysqldao.MySQLIssueDAO

  • public class MySQLIssueDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Issue>
    Class MySQLIssueDAO contains methods allowing to extract information about Issues reported in the application, add new Issues, update existent Issues, and delete them.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Vasili Andreev
    See Also:
    Issue, AbstractDAO

      Returns the list of type T Entity objects (T can be a Member, Project, Issue, etc.) available in the application.
